cPostModuleDeleteNotification Class Reference

#include <cmodelchange.h>

Inheritance diagram for cPostModuleDeleteNotification:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Fired at the end of cModule::deleteModule().

The module object no longer exists at this point, and its submodules have also been deleted. Fields include properties of the deleted module. It also includes the module pointer (in case it serves as a key in some user data structure), but it must NOT be dereferenced because it points to a deleted object.

Public Attributes

cModule * module
int moduleId

Member Data Documentation

cModule* cPostModuleDeleteNotification::module

Pointer of the deleted module. The module object has already been deleted at this point, and the pointer invalid -- you SHOULD NOT DEREFERENCE it in any way.

int cPostModuleDeleteNotification::moduleId

The ID of the deleted module.

cModuleType* cPostModuleDeleteNotification::moduleType

Type of the deleted module.

const char* cPostModuleDeleteNotification::moduleName

Name of the deleted module.

cModule* cPostModuleDeleteNotification::parentModule

Parent module of the deleted module.

int cPostModuleDeleteNotification::vectorSize

Size of the module vector that contained the deleted module; -1 if not a vector.

int cPostModuleDeleteNotification::index

Index of the deleted in its vector; 0 if not part of a module vector.
